title: Love and Glory: A Question of Honor / No Surrender / Return of a Hero
description: The By Request "RM" 3's line delivers more of what our readers want: quality editorial content, the best authors and value for their money. This program showcases some of Harlequin's and Silhouette's finest authors. By Request "RM" 3's books are guaranteed to deliver top sales results for you
